reviewText: A great documentary about a great race.
Alain hits another homer. We need more!!!

WOW 111. What a story. I have always read about this race for years but never really understood what the terrain was like nor the history behind the race.. Of course with Alain De Cadenet doing the directing and doing the commentary it was bound to turnout GREAT I have followed Alain for years with his various programs and they are all outstanding. Of course you have to be a car nut and into all kinds of racing to really appreciate ths production. WELL DONE!!
Very average to short and overpriced. The story should have shown a little more of the historial past races.
Fantastic in every way! Loved every minute of it.
Not directed by a true car guy?  A very nice story, but light on the actual racing cars.
Charming and beautiful depiction of the people, history, cars, and beauty of the Targa Florio. A must-see for any road racing fan!
